import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Header from '../Header/Header' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import './Product.css' function Product() { let productsList = useSelector((store) => store.products.products); useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchProducts()); }, []); return (
{productsList.map((elem) => (

{elem.title}

{elem.price}$

{elem.discont_price}$

-{elem.nprice}%

Description

{elem.description}

))}
) } export default Product
